description:
Heidari Law Group, PC, is a personal injury law firm based in Los Angeles, California, with two other California offices and a location in Las Vegas, Nevada. We provide the resources our clients need for success in the most complex and challenging lawsuits.

Personal injury law

We practice across many different practice areas within personal injury. In fact, attorneys routinely refer cases to us when they require in-depth investigation, trial and so on.

Those with questions about a specific case may request a free consultation. Some examples of cases we handle include car accidents, aviation crashes, product liability, bad faith insurance, premises liability, medical malpractice, construction accidents, animal bites and wrongful death.

Dedicated representation

At our law firm, we take cases we believe we can bring to the best possible conclusions. We are ready to stand by our clients no matter how challenging things get.

Each lawsuit has an experienced, knowledgeable personal injury attorney championing it. We can also assist clients with legal issues involving employment and labor law and civil rights violations. We are highly responsive to client questions, even outside of normal business hours. It is important to know that the people handling a case are capable, but even better to know that they care.

Accessible advice

Heidari Law Group, PC, is here for the injured. Our law firm does not collect any attorneys' fees until our clients win. We offer free consultations, we accept credit cards and we have virtual appointments available.
